Sept. 17, 1932 D Durham Contest
Durham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
durham-contest
None
Recollections of Wallace
Cricket Field, Durham City March contest - 1st Urpeth, 2nd Wallsend. Promoters Durham Branch of the Working Men's Club and Institute Union Ltd. Held on the Durham City Cricket Field. Open to bands in the Counties of Northumberland and Durham who have not, up to the time of entries closing won a cash prize of £15 or over during 1931 and 1932. Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £7.10s., 3rd £5, 4th £2.10s. 14 bnds competed.
Feb. 12, 2012, 9:49 p.m. Dec. 13, 2016, 4:22 p.m.
